Mon, 15 Jul 2024 17:02:00 +0000 The real estate numbers for Gisborne in June from REINZ showed a 7% lift in the year-on-year median house sale price from June 2023 to $615,000 last month.

Minister of Education to challenge amount awarded to school counsellors, Kath and Ron Cronin-Lampe, for workplace stress https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/minister-of-education-seeks-leave-to-challenge-record-amount-awarded-to-school-counsellors-for-workplace-stress/I3AVMW4DDRAF3LCTQSR2A4AJSU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/minister-of-education-seeks-leave-to-challenge-record-amount-awarded-to-school-counsellors-for-workplace-stress/I3AVMW4DDRAF3LCTQSR2A4AJSU/ Catherine HuttonKath and Ron Cronin-Lampe were awarded damages after dealing with 32 deaths. Mon, 15 Jul 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Ron Cronin-Lampe (left) and Kath Cronin-Lampe (right) were counsellors at Melville High School. The Minister of Education is seeking leave from the Court of Appeal to appeal the earlier Employment Court decision which awarded them almost $1.8 million in damages for workplace stress. Photo / Supplied
Westpac CEO Catherine McGrath assesses cyclone impact in Gisborne https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/16/westpac-ceo-catherine-mcgrath-asseses-cyclone-impact-in-gisborne/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/16/westpac-ceo-catherine-mcgrath-asseses-cyclone-impact-in-gisborne/ Wynsley WrigleyWestpac CEO visits Gisborne post-Cyclone Gabrielle, meets locals.Mon, 15 Jul 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Westpac chief executive Catherine McGrath, Gisborne Westpac bank manager Derek Craven (second from left) and Westpac Head of Customer Experience, Northern, Andrew Twidle (third from left) meet Eastland Helicopter Rescue Trustee Ian Parker and helicopter crew Gareth McDougall, Ben Fry and JP Jordaan. Westpac are one of the sponsors of the helicopter service. Photo / Paul Rickard
